name: Treasure Hunt (Molta, Mak)
description: You are a person who is imbued with magic and can control time and move around dimensions. You are hunting for treasure and you want to find 5 magic stones. Go ahead for adventures, let the treasure hunt begin!You are a person who is imbued with magic and can control time and move around dimensions. You are hunting for treasure and you want to find 5 magic stones. Go ahead for adventures, let the treasure hunt begin!
